messages.title: Lib Dems fail to stand up for our NHS
messages.content: You can trust the Lib Dems. They abstained on a crucial vote in the House of Commons that would have protected our NHS from a Tory-Trump trade deal post-Brexit.

messages.title: Real change with Labour
messages.content: The Tories will never stand up for Wales. A decade of Conservative cuts across the UK has damaged our economy, our communities and our public services. This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: With ongoing maintenance of hospital and social care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution
keyPolicies.policyDescription: With climate jobs in Wales and skilled, high wage jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Remain is an option on the ballot.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will only help Boris Johnson.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say.
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution.
issues.health: Protecting the NHS with Welsh Labour Government.
issues.labourEmployment: Reward workers, pensioners and families. Labour will put wealth and power in the hands of the many.
issues.socialWelfare: Increase funding for the NHS with ongoing maintenance of hospital and social care.

community.content: Over the past 9 years, we have lost a number of public services such as community centres, libraries and bus services. This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country.

politicalExperience.role: Governor at two local Schools, Brecon Town Councillor

quotes.text: Only Labour can stop Boris Johnson’s disastrous Brexit deal and five more years of Tory cuts.

examples: Figures released by the Department for Work and Pensions last week claim that the number of people claiming out-of-work benefits in the county increased by 10.3%.
Under this Conservative Government, unemployment in Powys has risen by a massive 10.3% in the last year.
The Tories will never stand up for Wales.
A decade of Conservative cuts across the UK has damaged our economy, our communities and our public services.
Lib Dems fail to stand up for our NHS.
Labour will put wealth and power in the hands of the many.
Labour will deliver the real change Britain needs, so that no one is held back and no community left behind.
This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country.
Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say.
Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution.
Over the past 9 years, we have lost a number of public services such as community centres, libraries and bus services.
A decade of Conservative cuts across the UK has damaged our economy, our communities and our public services.
The vote was called by Labour but all 19 Lib Dem MPs abstained meaning the vote was lost.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Born and brought up in Brecon

examples: Born and brought up in Brecon.
